title: Ha, "new" sleep mechanic...
body:
{{champion:17}} : Motha fuckas I had the sleep mechanic before it saw the light of day.

{{champion:17}} : I could have been a simple little huggy wuggy badger man who helped you get some rest with a nice dose of nyquil in a dart.

{{champion:17}} : But no, Riot wasn't prepared for such a step. They didn't know how to make the mechanic work like that back then.

{{champion:17}} : No... they turned to evil instead. They gave me a blind instead.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1mFCoQa_0yw/hqdefault.jpg

YOU MADE ME LIKE THIIIIIIIS.

######I still fucking love Teemo...
